mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yuan_reservation ( reservation_id, user_id, amount, saga_id, status, expires_at, created_at ) VALUES ( #{reservationId}, #{userId}, #{amount}, #{sagaId}, #{statusAsString}, #{expiresAt}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, reservation_id, user_id, amount, saga_id, status, expires_at, created_at, confirmed_at, released_at FROM yuan_reservation WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId}
SELECT id, reservation_id, user_id, amount, saga_id, status, expires_at, created_at, confirmed_at, released_at FROM yuan_reservation WHERE saga_id = #{sagaId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE yuan_reservation SET status = 'CONFIRMED', confirmed_at = #{confirmedAt} WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId} AND status = 'RESERVED'
UPDATE yuan_reservation SET status = 'RELEASED', released_at = #{releasedAt} WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId} AND status IN ('RESERVED', 'CONFIRMED')
mapper.select: SELECT id, reservation_id, user_id, amount, saga_id, status, expires_at, created_at, confirmed_at, released_at FROM yuan_reservation WHERE status = 'RESERVED' AND expires_at < #{currentTime} ORDER BY expires_at ASC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0.0) FROM yuan_reservation WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'RESERVED' AND expires_at > NOW()
